description: Numbers n such that continued fraction for sqrt(n) has period 7.
links: Harvey P. Dale, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..500
mathematica: cfp7Q[n_]:=Module[{s=Sqrt[n]},!IntegerQ[s]&&Length[ ContinuedFraction[ s][[2]]]==7]; Select[Range[6000],cfp7Q] (* _Harvey P. Dale_, Aug 11 2013 *)
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Walter Gilbert
